content:
# I have successfully harvested 10 iron ore from the patch, and my inventory now contains 10 iron ore along with the stone furnace.
# 
# With this iron ore, I can now proceed to smelt it into iron plates and craft the necessary components for the burner mining drill.
# 
# Here are the next steps:
# 1. Place the stone furnace.
# 2. Insert the iron ore into the furnace to smelt it into iron plates.
# 3. Once I have enough iron plates, I will craft the iron gear wheels and the burner mining drill.

# First, I will place the stone furnace at a suitable position.

place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=Position(x=-16.5, y=25.5))  # Placing the stone furnace at the patch location.
